p: As early as 2010, Dr. Yuan had already analyzed the bioactivity, mechanism, and security of the essential oil from A. lavandulaefolia systematically, and demonstrated the prospects of this plantâ€™s resource development [ 48]. This work finds the essential oil of the above-ground portion of A. lavandulaefolia and its main compounds had toxic effects to L. serricorne adults. Further studies will continue to explore more chemical constituents in this plant.
